DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : : This study perform compare accuracy non-cycloplegic photorefraction cycloplegic refraction detection refractive amblyopia risk factor determine correspond beneficial cut point . Method : In diagnostic accuracy study , right eye 185 child ( 1 14 year ) undergo first non-cycloplegic photorefraction ( PlusOptix SO4 photoscreener ) cycloplegic refraction October 2009 August 2010 . Based cycloplegic refraction result , hyperopia ( ≥+3.5D ) , myopia ( ≥-3D ) , astigmatism ( ≥1.5D ) , anisometropia ( ≥1.5D ) set criterion base AAPOS guideline . The difference detection refractive amblyopia risk factor two method main outcome measure .
DOC.brief_title: Is Non-cycloplegic Photorefraction Applicable Screening Refractive Risk Factors Amblyopia ?
